text: Kamrunnahar Azad Swapna is a Bangladeshi film actress. She won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Child Artist for the film Mayer Dabi (1986). ==Selected films== * Mayer Dabi (1986) ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! title: Kamrunnahar Azad Swapna
